Articles.Content: As soon as my rocket launches the parachute ejects and i can figure out the problems-suggestions?

Have you staged it correctly?

The parachutes may be on the beginning stage. In the construction, look to the staging, are parachutes at the bottom? If so, drag them to the top of the staging.

Have you staged it correctly?

The parachutes may be on the beginning stage. In the construction, look to the staging, are parachutes at the bottom? If so, drag them to the top of the staging.

You will need to make more stages if you want to seperate the parachute completely from what it currently is in.

Mouse over the stages and you'll see small + and - icons. Click on the + to add a stage
Listen to Sirrobert and Norpo, for they are wise.
